title: Ballroom dancing,: With 100 diagrams and photographs of the quickstep, waltz, foxtrot, tango, etc
description: A classic and comprehensive guidebook to standard techniques of ballroom dancing written by a dance teacher of international renown. The Quickstep, Waltz, Foxtrot and Tango are illustrated and described in great detail. The book also includes a section entitled "Ballroom Novelty Dances and Games".
author: Alex Moore
